code:
module TopModule (
    input  logic clk,
    input  logic load,
    input  logic [511:0] data,
    output logic [511:0] q
);

    logic [511:0] next_q;

    always @(*) begin
        next_q[0] = 1'b0 ^ q[1]; // q[-1] is considered 0
        next_q[511] = q[510] ^ 1'b0; // q[512] is considered 0
        for (int i = 1; i < 511; i++) begin
            next_q[i] = q[i-1] ^ q[i+1];
        end
    end

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (load) begin
            q <= data;
        end else begin
            q <= next_q;
        end
    end

    initial begin
        q = 512'b0;
    end

endmodule
